GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.18.15
GSD.description:
pinctrl: ralink: Check for null return of devm_kcalloc

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.15 by commit 5595d30c4dc27d939635c3188c68203b6ece1711, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit a86854d0c599b3202307abceb68feee4d7061578. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: pinctrl: ralink: Check for null return of devm_kcalloc
